meta.description: Determine the optimal number of high-volume and low-volume pipes to minimize the total number of pipes while meeting gas demand and technician constraints.

sets.name: PIPE_TYPES
sets.description: Types of pipes available for use.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity in US gallons for each type of pipe.

params.name: technicians_required
params.description: Number of technicians required for each type of pipe.

params.name: max_high_volume_percentage
params.description: Maximum percentage of high-volume pipes allowed.

params.name: min_low_volume_pipes
params.description: Minimum number of low-volume pipes required.

vars.name: num_pipes
vars.description: Number of pipes of each type to be used.

objective.name: min_total_pipes
objective.description: Minimize the total number of pipes used.

constraints.name: demand_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the total capacity meets the daily demand.

constraints.name: technician_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the total number of technicians required does not exceed available technicians.

constraints.name: high_volume_percentage_constraint
constraints.description: Limit the percentage of high-volume pipes.

constraints.name: min_low_volume_pipes_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure at least the minimum number of low-volume pipes are used.
